TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void EKEventSearchCallback(EKEvent theEvent, ref bool stop);
.class public auto ansi sealed EKEventSearchCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: If you set this ref value to true, the enumeration will stop.
Docs.summary: Delegate signature for the event enumeration method in
Docs.remarks: The method will be invoked repeatedly, once for each event that matches the provided NSPredicate.
